Welcome.nopassword: Ọrọ igbaniwọle kankan Ko Ti Jẹ Ṣiseto Fun Apoowo naa. Jọwọ Ṣẹda Ọrọ igbaniwọle Kan naa.
Welcome.incorrect: Ọrọ igbaniwọle Verto Naa Ko Tọ.
Welcome.subtitle_message: Verto ni ọna abawọle rẹ sinu Volentix.
Welcome.join_message: Inu wa dun wipe o ti darapọ mọ wa.

CreateVertoPassword.important_warning: Jọwọ farabalẹ ka. Ọrọ igbaniwọle yii ko se gba pada. Ti o ba gbagbe tabi padanu ọrọ igbaniwọle rẹ o ma padanu awọn apo owo rẹ titi lailai.
CreateVertoPassword.fillall: Jọwọ pese idahun si gbogbo awọn aaye ti o wa loke
CreateVertoPassword.onlysupport: Ni bayii, Verto n ṣe atilẹyin agbara sise afikun awọn kọkọrọ gbangba nikan. Lati se afikun apo owo, kan pese orukọ, adirẹẹsi apo owo, ati ọrọ igbaniwọle Verto.
CreateVertoPassword.createkey: Ṣẹda kọkọrọ onimeji gbangba/ikọkọ fun apo owo tuntun kan. Kiyesi pe NIKAN kọkọrọ gbangba jẹ fifipamọ sinu Verto. Ojuse rẹ ni imojuto kọkọrọ ikọkọ ara rẹ, ipamọ rẹ, ati aabo.
CreateVertoPassword.choose: Piinu lati ṣii apo owo nipa nini kan tẹ asaayan lori orukọ rẹ.
CreateVertoPassword.note: AKIYESI: Verto ko ni anfani lati ri awọn apo owo ti o ti jẹ pipaarẹ gba pada.

WalletManager.used: Orukọ naa tabi apo owo naa ti jẹ lilo tẹlẹ.
WalletManager.both: O gbọdọ pese orukọ kan ati kọkọrọ gbangba fun apo owo naa.
WalletManager.cannotrecover: Verto ko le gba apo owo naa pada lẹhin ti o ba ti jẹ pipaarẹ. Tẹ bọtini paarẹ lẹẹkansi fun pipari iparẹ.

KeepYourKeysSafe.before: Ṣaaju ki o to tẹsiwaju, o ṣe pataki lati ṣe akiyesi pe ojuse rẹ ni gbogbo isakoso, ipamọ, Idabobo, ati gbigba kọkọrọ ikọkọ rẹ pada. Ko kin se ẹlomiiran ti o fi mọ awọn alabasepọ ti awujọ eto Volentix.
KeepYourKeysSafe.choices: O ni awọn aṣayan meji lori abojuto kọkọrọ ikọkọ rẹ. Awọn ọna mejeeji jẹ ṣiṣe pẹlu ilana lati rii daju pe kọkọrọ ikọkọ rẹ wa ni ipamọ ailewu.
KeepYourKeysSafe.second: Tabi, daabobo kọkọrọ rẹ sinu faili idaabobo ti o ni ọrọ igbaniwọle.

SaveYourKeys.strategy: Ṣeto ilana ibi ipamọ afojuri ti kọkọrọ ikọkọ rẹ. Igbesẹ ipamọ yii gbọdọ ni ero igba pipẹ, pẹlu:
SaveYourKeys.physical: Aabo Afojuri: Awọn irufẹ eyikeyi ibi ipamọ ti o n pese aabo ti o n wa. Ronu ibi ti o mọ pe o ni aabo lori ole ati awọn eroja rẹ. apẹẹrẹ diẹ jẹ ibi ipamọ ti ile tabi ti banki, tabi agbẹjọro. o le yan lati dabobo awọn kọkọrọ rẹ nipa fifi adakọ pamọ ni awọn aaye pupọ.
SaveYourKeys.legacy: Ijogun: Nkan n ṣẹlẹ. Aye n dopin. O nilo lati gbero gbigbe apo owo rẹ fun ẹlomiiran. Ni awọn igba miiran ti o le jẹ iwe ogun pinpin, jọwọ ṣe ayẹwo awọn aṣayan rẹ daradara. Ipinnu jẹ tirẹ.
SaveYourKeys.agree: Mo faramọ Awọn ofin ati Awọn adehun
SaveYourKeys.responsible: Emi ni mo ni gbogbo ojuṣe isakoso eto aabo ti kọkọrọ ikọkọ mi
SaveYourKeys.access: O ye mi pe Volentix ati/tabi awọn alabaṣepọ ko ni aaye si kọkọrọ ikọkọ mi
SaveYourKeys.wifi: O ye mi pe WIFI yoo jẹ pipa fun igba diẹ nigba ti isẹda awọn kọkọrọ naa ba n lọ lọwọ

DisplayKey.understand: O ye mi pe kọkọrọ ikọkọ ko si ni ipamọ ninu Verto ati pe ko le se gba pada.
DisplayKey.already: Orukọ naa tabi apo owo naa ti jẹ lilo tẹlẹ.
DisplayKey.mustname: O gbọdọ pese orukọ kan fun kọkọrọ rẹ.
DisplayKey.walletname: Fun Apo owo ni Orukọ: ie Ifowopamọ
DisplayKey.goodpen: Lo ikọwe ti o dara ti ko ni rẹ mọ ara wọn tabi parẹ lẹyin akoko diẹ.
DisplayKey.goodpaper: Lo iwe gidi ti o ma pẹ.
DisplayKey.polaroid: Ti o ba fẹ ya aworan kan, lo iru ẹrọ ti kii ṣe oni-nọmba bi 35mm tabi Polaroid.
DisplayKey.look: Wa ibi ti o lọwọrọ, ti ko lewu, ti o ni aabo, ti o gbẹ gẹgẹbi apoti ifowopamọ ti banki.
DisplayKey.provisions: Fi awọn ipese si iwe ipin ogun rẹ lori ẹniti o ma ati bi jijogun apo owo rẹ se ma waye.

Main.transactions: O ko ni awọn iṣowo kankan

TransactionHistory.number_of_approved_blocks: /6 Awọn bulọọki ti o ti ni Ijẹrisi

ChangeVertoPassword.confirm: Se ijẹri ọrọ igbaniwọle Verto tuntun
ChangeVertoPassword.required: Gbogbo awọn aaye ni a nilo.
ChangeVertoPassword.recommended: A gba niyanju pe ki o kọkọ ṣe ẹ̀dà àbọ̀-ábá iṣeto ti lọwọlọwọ yii ti Verto ṣaaju ki o to se iyipada ọrọ igbaniwọle naa. O le ṣe ẹ̀dà àbọ̀-ábáVerto
ChangeVertoPassword.access: N se ayipada ọrọ igbaniwọle naa lati wọle si Verto. Lọgan ti o jẹ yiyan, gbogbo iṣeto wa ni atipa nipa lilo ọrọ igbaniwọle titun.

BackupWallet.simple: Simple tooling to back up your wallet in order to restore or open on another device. Simply
BackupWallet.directory: Select a directory to back up the wallet to.
BackupWallet.willbackup: Verto yoo ṣe ẹ̀dà àbọ̀-ábá apo owo pẹlu orukọ 'verto' + ọjọ naa + '.config'

ChoosePassword.confirm: Se ijẹri ọrọ igbaniwọle Apo owo
ChoosePassword.storeext: Store on an external drive, wallet, or USB key.
ChoosePassword.storeloc: Store it on your computers local drive.

RequestNativeChainAddress.err_noAddressAvailable: Ko si adirẹẹsi fun asopọ naa. Jọwọ gbiyanju lẹẹkansi.
RequestNativeChainAddress.err_investor_must_wait: O gbọdọ duro wakati kan ṣaaju ki o to beere adirẹsi titun.
RequestNativeChainAddress.second_p: 1. The address you receive is only valid for a limited period of time.
RequestNativeChainAddress.second_p_point_1: 2. Any transaction you send after the allocation period may be lost.
RequestNativeChainAddress.third_p: 3. You are only able to request one native chain address per hour.
RequestNativeChainAddress.access: O ye mi mo si faramọ

NotWhitelisted.kyc_1: Lati gba VTX, awọn oludokoowo gbọdọ se KYC (Mọ Onibara rẹ) pẹlu ọkan ninu awọn alabaṣepọ wa ti a gbẹkẹle. Ilana yii ni o wa lati rii daju pe a wa ni ibamu pẹlu awọn olutọsọna ni agbegbe rẹ. Kiyesi pe ilana yii gbọdọ jẹ pipari lẹẹkan saaju ki a to gba ọ bi olulọwọsi. Kiyesi pe yiyan yi yoo ṣo apo owo rẹ pọ mọ yii pẹlu ibẹwẹ KYC rẹ.
NotWhitelisted.second_p: Ti o ba ti se KYC tẹlẹ, amọ, o ko ti so apo owo rẹ pẹ pẹlu àkọọlẹ rẹ, jọwọ wọle si olupese KYC lati ṣe bẹ. A nilo igbesẹ yii ṣaaju ki o to ni anfani lati gba VTX. Kiyesi pe ti o ba se KYC tẹlẹ ninu apo owo naa o ko ni nilo lati ṣe igbesẹ yii.
NotWhitelisted.assign_verto_to_venue_desc: If you are a member of Venue, you will need to associate a wallet in order to claim your VTX. Note that you will also need to complete the KYC process. Once both actions are complete, your VTX will be allocated to this wallet.

KycAlreadyAssociated.first_p: The KYC'd account has already been allocated a Verto Public Address.

VenueAssignAddress.important_info: Alaye yii ko si ni ipamọ Verto.
VenueAssignAddress.email_verification_required: O gbọdọ kọkọ ṣe ijẹrisi imeeli rẹ pẹlu Ibugbe ṣaaju ki o to ṣe asọpọ apo owo naa.
VenueAssignAddress.verto_address_not_unique: Adirẹẹsi naa ti wa fun olumulo miiran tẹlẹ.
